DC Super Heroes vs Taka no Tsume-dan Pro: A collaboration episode promoting the BD/DVD release of DC Super Heroes vs Taka no Tsume Dan and the Japanese BD/DVD release of Justice League both going on sale March 3, 2018 with the special goods that come with them. The characters all break the 4th wall to self-promote their material and get into a scuffle about whose release would sell better.
['DC Super Heroes vs Taka no Tsume-dan']
